properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSION_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
